songs.title: Loose*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippet

[Chorus]
-the crowd gon' get loose
I got like one but I need two
Hop in the coupe and this shit got no roof
You hate on a nigga, who are you?
She say that she love my flow, so smooth
She say that a young nigga real smooth
You know that the crowd gon' get loose
You know that the crowd gon' get loose
You know that the crowd gon' get loose-
